page.title: 07RECREATION IN INVERURIE
page.content:
In Inverurie there are lots of sports facilities which are available to the public. These facilities include a Squash Club, Bowling Greens, Putting Green, and Golf Course.
With the River Don and its tributary the River Urie at hand, a popular sport is angling. Fishing permits are necessary to fish in either of these rivers. April and May are the best times for fly fishing, with a plentiful supply of trout in the clear unpolluted waters of the Urie. Salmon swim in the Don and the best time to hook a salmon is in the autumn when the river is in spate.
